pullRequest.title: [Issue-2101] Minimize finalized state regeneration
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Move handling of newly finalized states to the Database.  This way, we won't bother regenerating finalized states if the storage mode is set to PRUNE.
Fixed Issue(s)
Fixes #2101
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: Move finalized state regeneration to Database
